text: Victor Alexandrovich Kostetskiy (; 12 April 1941 - 6 November 2014) was a Russian and Soviet actor. Kosteskiy was born in Zhmerinka. He was known for his roles in Wedding Krechinsky, Truffaldino from Bergamo, and in Treasure Island. Kostetskiy died on November 6, 2014 at the age of 74 in Saint Petersburg, Russia. ==Other websites== * * Biography rusactors.ru Category:1941 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Russian actors Category:Soviet actors
title: Victor Kostetskiy
